scripts.install:all: npm install && cd workers && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.deploy:pages: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy build --project-name=mavi-puzzle
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:workers && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.db:create: cd workers && wrangler d1 create mavi-puzzle-db
scripts.db:init: cd workers && wrangler d1 execute mavi-puzzle-db --file=../database/schema.sql
scripts.db:query: cd workers && wrangler d1 execute mavi-puzzle-db
scripts.r2:create: cd workers && wrangler r2 bucket create mavi-puzzle-images
